business.pricing: Appraisal fees vary by collection size and complexity. Contact Heritage Valuations London in London, ON for a tailored quote.

content.about: Heritage Valuations London provides professional antique appraisal services in the London area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Helping London, ON collectors with appraisals for Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles, Estate Jewelry.
